item.title: Quantum stocks like Rigetti plunge after Nvidia's Huang says the computers are 15 to 30 years away
item.description: Quantum computing stocks dropped Wednesday after Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang declared that useful quantum computers are likely decades in the future.

item.title: Will the stock market be open tomorrow? As Jimmy Carter is laid to rest, the U.S. will observe a National Day of Mourning.
item.description: The U.S. will honor former President Jimmy Carter, who died on Dec. 29 at age 100, with an official state funeral on Thursday, Jan. 9.
